item.title: Moana 2 Review: The Disney Animation's Heartwarming Story Is Undermined By A Questionable Villain
item.description: The animation is still strong and the character beats are affecting, but the villain and his motivations stand in the film's way of true greatness.

item.title: "Why The Heck Did I Make This?": Clint Eastwood Reflects On His 69 Year Film Career
item.description: Legendary actor and director Clint Eastwood reflects on his 69-year film career dating back to 1955, asking himself "Why the heck did I make this?"

item.title: There's No Way Scream 7 Can Solve The Biggest Sam & Tara Mystery Now
item.description: Scream 7's latest casting update confirms a major rumor, but thanks to that, the movie now can't solve the biggest Sam and Tara mystery.
